page.title: 14TRANSPORT/INDUST NE.PLYMOUTH
page.content: Many firms move to Estover to make use of the good transport network and the possibility of expanding their firms. The Estover Industrial Estate is found in the eastern part of Plymouth.It is well away from the built up city centre,but goods can easily be transported from Plymouth's airport and the main roadway,the A38.This road goes to Exeter where it joins the M5, making it easy to get to Bristol, London and Birmingham.The factories on the Industrial Estate can take their goods to the nearby airport from where they are delivered,quickly,to the major cities of Britain. Transport by rail is also possible as the station is easy to get to from this area of Plymouth.The main line runs to London and the North.
